alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 4:55PM CST until February 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Armstrong County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northern Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 455 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Panhandle to Claude to 10 miles northeast of Wayside, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pampa, Panhandle, Claude, Miami, Briscoe, Wheeler, White Deer, Mclean, Groom, Lefors, Skellytown, Howardwick, New Mobeetie, Lake Mcclellan, Twitty, Kellerville, Goodnight, Kingsmill, Alanreed and Codman. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for the Panhandle of Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Do not drive into areas where blowing dust restricts visibility.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Roberts; Wheeler
